Daily Reflection
### FALSE PRIDE
July 19
**Many of us who had thought ourselves religious awoke to the limitations of this attitude. Refusing to place God first, we had deprived ourselves of His help.**
**TWELVE STEPS AND TWELVE TRADITIONS, p. 75**
**Many of us who had thought ourselves religious awoke to the limitations of this attitude. Refusing to place God first, we had deprived ourselves of His help.**
**TWELVE STEPS AND TWELVE TRADITIONS, p. 75**
